nodes.text: Garollian ghost vipers were creatures native to a location within the Garollia system of the Expansion Region's Baroli sector. The ghost vipers had tongues that they could move rapidly. While engaged in a lightsaber duel against the Jedi Master Obi-Wan Kenobi during the Separatist attack on the planet Coruscant in 19 BBY, Count Dooku mentally compared Kenobi's lightsaber attacks to the quick movement of a ghost viper's tongue.
The Garollian ghost viper was first mentioned in the 2005 novelization of the film Star Wars: Episode III Revenge of the Sith, which was written by Matthew Stover.
